channel.title: Posts on VibeCoder
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on VibeCoder

item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.description: This is the start of my journey on my way to blog. I am not a professional blogger in any way right now. Yes, I have started blogs in the past but right now, I am finally feeling as if I am speaking to the public to express my thoughts. I think a lot. I think this will be a good outlet for me. I have setup auto publish using git and hosted this on github.
